words.source: H834 conj+prep+relative particle; KJV 'And the more', ESV 'But the more', NASB 'But the more' — all agree on comparative sense
H6031 Piel impf 3mp; KJV 'they afflicted them', ESV 'they were oppressed', NASB 'they afflicted them' — KJV/NASB agree on 'afflict', ESV uses 'oppress'
H853 direct object marker + 3ms suffix (collective referent); KJV/ESV/NASB all render as 'them' (referring to Israel collectively)
H3651 adverb 'so, thus'; paired with כַּאֲשֶׁר to form 'the more…the more'; KJV/ESV/NASB all agree
H7235 Qal impf 3ms (collective subject); KJV 'they multiplied', ESV 'they multiplied', NASB 'they multiplied' — all agree
H3651 conj + adverb; KJV 'and grew', ESV 'and the more they spread abroad', NASB 'and the more they spread out' — continues comparative
H6555 Qal impf 3ms (collective); KJV 'grew', ESV 'spread abroad', NASB 'spread out' — slight variation but same sense
H6973 Qal wayyiqtol 3mp; KJV 'they were grieved', ESV 'they were in dread', NASB 'they were in dread' — ESV/NASB agree; KJV diverges with 'grieved'
H6440 prep + noun cstr pl 'from the face of'; KJV 'because of', ESV 'of', NASB 'because of' — KJV/NASB agree
H1121 noun masc pl cstr; KJV 'the children of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the sons of' — all convey same meaning
